name: Boozy Blueberry-Maple Shake
description: Gin may not be the first spirit that comes to mind for a boozy milkshake, but blueberries and gin are a perfect match, making for a boozy shake that is slightly more sophisticated.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blueberries and gin to the blender. Pulse a few times then puree on medium high speed until smooth and no large pieces of blueberry skin are be visible, about 30 seconds.
Add ice cream and maple syrup and blend on medium high speed just until smooth, about 30 seconds. Serve immediately.
